authorInfo.authorPhotoAlt: Headshot of author Caylee Clay. Caylee is smiling with a grey jacket and straight bangs
authorInfo.authorBio: Caylee Clay, RDN CDN CYT (they/them) is a dietitian-nutritionist, software engineer, scientist, researcher, author, & autoimmune disease expert. Caylee is the author of Gain Control Over Your Psoriasis. Outside of work, Caylee loves gardening, hiking, cooking, & biking all over NYC.

disclaimer: PLEASE NOTE: Sections of this article may not be appropriate for those who have been diagnosed with an eating disorder, suspect they may have an eating disorder, or are engaging in disordered eating behaviors. This article is provided as informational content only, not as medical advice.
affiliateDisclosure: This page may contain affiliate links. We only recommend products that we have used and/or are supported by research. Your support helps to keep the below information available free of charge.
